actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to reiterate that the Congress has not delegated to the Federal Trade Commission any authority to preempt the laws of the States and their political subdivisions.

summary.text: Declares that Congress has not delegated to the Federal Trade Commission any authority to preempt the laws of the States and their political subdivisions.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to reiterate that the Congress has not delegated to the Federal Trade Commission any authority to preempt the laws of the States and their political subdivisions.
